name: iso3166-2
description: Tiny, fast, modular ISO 3166-2 lookup library
author: Michael Scott Hertzberg <mshertzberg@gmail.com> (http://michael.hertzberg.co/)

scripts.prepublish: npm run generate && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build-global: echo 'Building lib/iso3166-2.global.js...' && browserify src/index.js --standalone iso31662 --outfile lib/iso3166-2.global.js
scripts.build-ugly: echo 'Building lib/iso3166-2.min.js...' && cat lib/iso3166-2.js | uglifyjs --noerr --screw-ie8 -m --output lib/iso3166-2.min.js
scripts.build-ugly-global: echo 'Building lib/iso3166-2.global.min.js...' && cat lib/iso3166-2.global.js | uglifyjs --noerr --screw-ie8 -m --output lib/iso3166-2.global.min.js
scripts.build: echo 'Building iso3166-2...' && npm run build-basic && npm run build-global && npm run build-ugly && npm run build-ugly-global
